main event: An observer noted a pulsating red and green flashing light in the northeast sky over Beaver Creek, Ohio on 27 October 1966.
interesting points: The light appeared to be hovering before it rapidly accelerated to the northwest and disappeared from view,The observer attempted to contact the object with a searchlight, but the object remained visible,The incident was reported to patrol officers who responded to the scene,The observer described the object consistently with typical UFO sightings,The conclusion of the report stated 'Insufficient data for evaluation.'
sighted object: pulsating red and green flashing light
witness description: One witness (a male adult), and another witness identified as Mrs. Soui.
